Text: This is the series on which the movie is based. They shortened the Title because it makes it sound like John Carter is a Princess - also I believe the movie incorporates material from multiple books.

Ha ha. I was such a hater at Disney as they really promoted the movie horribly and wondered why just the title John Carter? 
Never guessed the drag queen aspect. LOL
Movies with Mars in the title never do good critically and or box office wise (Mars Attacks, Mars needs Moms), also John Carter of Mars implies he an alien in a few ways to the uninitiated .
